amendment.description: To clarify the availability of certain funds made available for the wildlife habitat incentive program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3676 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3676 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Bennett. (consideration: CR S3786; text: CR S3786) To clarify the availability of certain funds made available for the wildlife habitat incentive program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3676 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3676 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Bennett.
